page.title: 10HEALTH WINTERBOURNE VALLEY
page.content: Personal health good with comparative- ly little illness. Infant mortality rate lower than average;major cause of death:accident, but few occupational accidents. Clean atmosphere, lack of stress and a slower pace of life give a good life expectancy. {CARE}Resident doctor may be consulted in emergencies and will visit the very infirm, but the nearest doctor's surgeries are in Dorchester. Local hospital is Dorchester County (8km) and nearest Accident and Emergency Unit is Weymouth (14km). Emergency services efficient and community care very good. {NURSING HOME}Whitway House caters for 20 elderly fee paying residents with nursing facilities available Â£180pw.{REST HOME}Steepleton Manor being converted to take 20 fee- paying residents ; no nursing facilities. Fees about Â£150-Â£200pw.
